mapper.insert: insert into household(name, address, email, phone, status) values (#{name}, #{address}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{status});
mapper.update: update household set name=#{item.name}, address=#{item.address}, email=#{item.email}, phone=#{item.phone}, status=#{item.status} where keyId = #{key};
mapper.select: select * from household where household.name like concat('%', #{st}, '%') or household.address like concat('%', #{st}, '%') or household.phone like concat('%', #{st}, '%') or household.email like concat('%', #{st}, '%');
